<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Earthglide Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3081)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=585" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=662" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 289 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 6,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This brown-and-gold cloak covers you from head to toe. Its weighty fabric doesn't move with the wind, instead hanging still as if carved of stone. 

**Activate—Glide Through Earth** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You Burrow through dirt and stone up to your land Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of your passing. If you end your movement inside solid stone, you are forcibly expelled into the nearest open area, taking 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 5 feet between the end of your movement and the open area. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Earthglide Cloak
